Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
image in notification now features station icon
changed notification color - fixed a crash in storagehelper
TransistorKeys now bundles all the keys&values used to control Transistor's state
Station.java is now Parcelable - yay - that could improve ui performance
bitmap had the wrong resolution
The collection object is now Parcelable, too. Less need to create new Collections all the time

The Collection object is now being initialized only once at the start of Transistor. This should result in less file i/o. MediaSession implementation is almost finished. Works fine with Wear notifications
